Articles.Content:
Pleasure spaceplane "Noctuoidea-2"

Ferrari in the world of spaceplane. Ideal for picnic with a girlfriend on the Mun or Dune, or such as the space station. In general, what further ado, see for yourself.

Features:

Version KSP - 0.90.0

Crew - 2 kerbals;

Number of pieces - 92;

Weight - 15.516t;

Fuel Capacity:

Fuel - 750;

Oxidizer - 550;

Power supply:

RITEG - 1;

The quantity of atmospheric engines - 1;

The quantity of nuclear propulsion engines - 1 (clipped in turbojet);

DeltaV in orbit 140x140km - 3050-3100m/s.

Control:

2 - Doors docking port;

3 - Ladder;

6 - ÃÂ¡argo doors;

8 - Turn on/off turbojet;

9 - Turn on/off intake;

0 - Turn on/off nuclear engine.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download

Edited February 12, 2015 by Reistlyn
this looks like there are some mod dependencies in it...like the look of it, though...Are there any mods in it?
Really lovely looking craft mate. I love the intake arrangement!
Ok, Great thing, might make it Jeb's personal SSTO!
Wow. I always have had a fancy for wing crafts like stealth bombers. Do you think you could add a bomb bay to it?
Prof. Endwalker, here the bomb bay not add unless redo from scratch.

Pleasure spaceplane Noctuoidea-2

Ferrari in the world of spaceplane. Ideal for picnic with a girlfriend on the Mun or Dune, or such as the space station. In general, what further ado, see for yourself.

It looks sweet and sleek! Eyeballing the aerodynamics, seems like it would tend to nosedive a lot... and it will probably prefer to fly upside down in fact. But boy, it looks so good, I'll totally let that slide.

Rune. Good job!
Rune, Tendency to overturn it does have a small. But if adaptation to the controls, it becomes is quite maneuverable aircraft.

Sampa, only stock:cool:

Hey the thing actually has a modded part on it. Something called a MKS.ScanOMatic?

What mod is this from?
